00019 public abstract class SqlDatabaseSnapshot implements DatabaseSnapshot {

00075     public SqlDatabaseSnapshot(Database database, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners, String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00076         try {
00077             this.schema = requestedSchema;
00078             this.database = database;
00079             this.databaseMetaData = database.getConnection().getMetaData();
00080             this.statusListeners = statusListeners;
00081 
00082             readTablesAndViews(requestedSchema);
00083             readForeignKeyInformation(requestedSchema);
00084             readPrimaryKeys(requestedSchema);
00085             readColumns(requestedSchema);
00086 //            //readUniqueConstraints(catalog, schema);
00087             readIndexes(requestedSchema);
00088             readSequences(requestedSchema);
00089 
00090             this.tables = new HashSet<Table>(tablesMap.values());
00091             this.views = new HashSet<View>(viewsMap.values());
00092             this.columns = new HashSet<Column>(columnsMap.values());
00093         } catch (SQLException e) {
00094             throw new JDBCException(e);
00095         }
00096     }
00097

00103         return tables;

00107         return views;

00110     public Column getColumn(Column column) {
00111         if (column.getTable() == null) {
00112             return getColumn(column.getView().getName(), column.getName());
00113         } else {
00114             return getColumn(column.getTable().getName(), column.getName());
00115         }
00116     }
00117 
00118     public Column getColumn(String tableName, String columnName) {
00119         String tableAndColumn = tableName + "." + columnName;
00120         Column returnColumn = columnsMap.get(tableAndColumn);
00121         if (returnColumn == null) {
00122             for (String key : columnsMap.keySet()) {
00123                 if (key.equalsIgnoreCase(tableAndColumn)) {
00124                     return columnsMap.get(key);
00125                 }
00126             }
00127         }
00128         return returnColumn;
00129     }
00130 
00131     public Set<Column> getColumns() {
00132         return columns;
00133     }

00136         return foreignKeys;
00137     }
00138

00140         return indexes;
00141     }

00144         return primaryKeys;

00149         return sequences;

00152     protected void readTablesAndViews(String schema) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00153         updateListeners("Reading tables for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00154         ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getTables(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), null, new String[]{"TABLE", "VIEW"});
00155         while (rs.next()) {
00156             String type = rs.getString("TABLE_TYPE");
00157             String name = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("TABLE_NAME"));
00158             String schemaName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("TABLE_SCHEM"));
00159             String catalogName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("TABLE_CAT"));
00160             String remarks = rs.getString("REMARKS");
00161 
00162             if (database.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, name) || database.isLiquibaseTable(name) || database.isSystemView(catalogName, schemaName, name)) {
00163                 if (name.equalsIgnoreCase(database.getDatabaseChangeLogTableName())) {
00164                     hasDatabaseChangeLogTable = true;
00165                 }
00166                 continue;
00167             }
00168 
00169             if ("TABLE".equals(type)) {
00170                 Table table = new Table(name);
00171                 table.setRemarks(StringUtils.trimToNull(remarks));
00172                 table.setDatabase(database);
00173                 tablesMap.put(name, table);
00174             } else if ("VIEW".equals(type)) {
00175                 View view = new View();
00176                 view.setName(name);
00177                 try {
00178                     view.setDefinition(database.getViewDefinition(schema, name));
00179                 } catch (JDBCException e) {
00180                     System.out.println("Error getting view with " + ((AbstractDatabase) database).getViewDefinitionSql(schema, name));
00181                     throw e;
00182                 }
00183 
00184                 viewsMap.put(name, view);
00185 
00186             }
00187         }
00188         rs.close();
00189 
00190         /* useful for troubleshooting table reading */
00191 //        if (tablesMap.size() == 0) {
00192 //            System.out.println("No tables found, all tables:");
00193 //
00194 //            String convertedCatalog = database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema);
00195 //            String convertedSchema = database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema);
00196 //
00197 //            System.out.println("Tried: "+convertedCatalog+"."+convertedSchema);
00198 //            convertedCatalog = null;
00199 //            convertedSchema = null;
00200 //
00201 //            rs = databaseMetaData.getTables(convertedCatalog, convertedSchema, null, new String[]{"TABLE", "VIEW"});
00202 //            while (rs.next()) {
00203 //                String type = rs.getString("TABLE_TYPE");
00204 //                String name = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00205 //                String schemaName = rs.getString("TABLE_SCHEM");
00206 //                String catalogName = rs.getString("TABLE_CAT");
00207 //
00208 //                if (database.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, name) || database.isLiquibaseTable(name) || database.isSystemView(catalogName, schemaName, name)) {
00209 //                    continue;
00210 //                }
00211 //
00212 //                System.out.println(catalogName+"."+schemaName+"."+name+":"+type);
00213 //
00214 //            }
00215 //            rs.close();
00216 //        }
00217     }
00218 
00219     protected String convertFromDatabaseName(String objectName) {
00220         if (objectName == null) {
00221             return null;
00222         }
00223         return objectName;
00224     }
00225 
00226     protected void readColumns(String schema) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00227         updateListeners("Reading columns for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00228 
00229         Statement selectStatement = database.getConnection().createStatement();
00230         ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getColumns(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), null, null);
00231         while (rs.next()) {
00232             Column columnInfo = new Column();
00233 
00234             String tableName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("TABLE_NAME"));
00235             String columnName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("COLUMN_NAME"));
00236             String schemaName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("TABLE_SCHEM"));
00237             String catalogName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("TABLE_CAT"));
00238             String remarks = rs.getString("REMARKS");
00239 
00240             if (database.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName) || database.isLiquibaseTable(tableName)) {
00241                 continue;
00242             }
00243 
00244             Table table = tablesMap.get(tableName);
00245             if (table == null) {
00246                 View view = viewsMap.get(tableName);
00247                 if (view == null) {
00248                     log.info("Could not find table or view " + tableName + " for column " + columnName);
00249                     continue;
00250                 } else {
00251                     columnInfo.setView(view);
00252                     view.getColumns().add(columnInfo);
00253                 }
00254             } else {
00255                 columnInfo.setTable(table);
00256                 table.getColumns().add(columnInfo);
00257             }
00258 
00259             columnInfo.setName(columnName);
00260             columnInfo.setDataType(rs.getInt("DATA_TYPE"));
00261             columnInfo.setColumnSize(rs.getInt("COLUMN_SIZE"));
00262             columnInfo.setDecimalDigits(rs.getInt("DECIMAL_DIGITS"));
00263 
00264             int nullable = rs.getInt("NULLABLE");
00265             if (nullable == DatabaseMetaData.columnNoNulls) {
00266                 columnInfo.setNullable(false);
00267             } else if (nullable == DatabaseMetaData.columnNullable) {
00268                 columnInfo.setNullable(true);
00269             }
00270 
00271             columnInfo.setPrimaryKey(isPrimaryKey(columnInfo));
00272 
00273             columnInfo.setAutoIncrement(database.isColumnAutoIncrement(schema, tableName, columnName));
00274 
00275             getColumnTypeAndDefValue(columnInfo, rs, database);
00276             columnInfo.setRemarks(remarks);
00277 
00278             columnsMap.put(tableName + "." + columnName, columnInfo);
00279         }
00280         rs.close();
00281         selectStatement.close();
00282     }
00283 
00297     protected void getColumnTypeAndDefValue(Column columnInfo, ResultSet rs, Database database) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00298         Object defaultValue = rs.getObject("COLUMN_DEF");
00299         try {
00300             columnInfo.setDefaultValue(database.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, columnInfo.getDataType(), columnInfo.getColumnSize(), columnInfo.getDecimalDigits()));
00301         } catch (ParseException e) {
00302             throw new JDBCException(e);
00303         }
00304         columnInfo.setTypeName(database.getColumnType(rs.getString("TYPE_NAME"), columnInfo.isAutoIncrement()));
00305 
00306     } // end of method getColumnTypeAndDefValue()
00307 
00308     protected boolean isPrimaryKey(Column columnInfo) {
00309         for (PrimaryKey pk : getPrimaryKeys()) {
00310             if (columnInfo.getTable() == null) {
00311                 continue;
00312             }
00313             if (pk.getTable().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(columnInfo.getTable().getName())) {
00314                 if (pk.getColumnNamesAsList().contains(columnInfo.getName())) {
00315                     return true;
00316                 }
00317             }
00318         }
00319 
00320         return false;
00321     }
00322 
00323     protected void readForeignKeyInformation(String schema) throws JDBCException, SQLException {
00324         updateListeners("Reading foreign keys for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00325 
00326         for (Table table : tablesMap.values()) {
00327             String dbCatalog = database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema);
00328             String dbSchema = database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema);
00329             ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getExportedKeys(dbCatalog, dbSchema, table.getName());
00330             ForeignKey fkInfo = null;
00331             while (rs.next()) {
00332                 String pkTableName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("PKTABLE_NAME"));
00333                 String pkColumn = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("PKCOLUMN_NAME"));
00334                 Table pkTable = tablesMap.get(pkTableName);
00335                 if (pkTable == null) {
00336                     throw new JDBCException("Could not find table " + pkTableName + " for column " + pkColumn);
00337                 }
00338                 int keySeq = rs.getInt("KEY_SEQ");
00339                 //Simple (non-composite) keys have KEY_SEQ=1, so create the ForeignKey.
00340                 //In case of subsequent parts of composite keys (KEY_SEQ>1) don't create new instance, just reuse the one from previous call.
00341                 //According to #getExportedKeys() contract, the result set rows are properly sorted, so the reuse of previous FK instance is safe.
00342                 if (keySeq == 1) {
00343                     fkInfo = new ForeignKey();
00344                 }
00345 
00346                 fkInfo.setPrimaryKeyTable(pkTable);
00347                 fkInfo.addPrimaryKeyColumn(pkColumn);
00348 
00349                 String fkTableName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("FKTABLE_NAME"));
00350                 String fkColumn = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("FKCOLUMN_NAME"));
00351                 Table fkTable = tablesMap.get(fkTableName);
00352                 if (fkTable == null) {
00353                     throw new JDBCException("Could not find table " + fkTableName + " for column " + fkColumn);
00354                 }
00355                 fkInfo.setForeignKeyTable(fkTable);
00356                 fkInfo.addForeignKeyColumn(fkColumn);
00357 
00358                 fkInfo.setName(convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("FK_NAME")));
00359 
00360                 Integer updateRule, deleteRule;
00361                 updateRule = rs.getInt("UPDATE_RULE");
00362                 if (rs.wasNull())
00363                     updateRule = null;
00364                 deleteRule = rs.getInt("DELETE_RULE");
00365                 if (rs.wasNull()) {
00366                     deleteRule = null;
00367                 }
00368                 fkInfo.setUpdateRule(updateRule);
00369                 fkInfo.setDeleteRule(deleteRule);
00370 
00371                 if (database.supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns()) {
00372                     short deferrablility = rs.getShort("DEFERRABILITY");
00373                     if (deferrablility == DatabaseMetaData.importedKeyInitiallyDeferred) {
00374                         fkInfo.setDeferrable(Boolean.TRUE);
00375                         fkInfo.setInitiallyDeferred(Boolean.TRUE);
00376                     } else if (deferrablility == DatabaseMetaData.importedKeyInitiallyImmediate) {
00377                         fkInfo.setDeferrable(Boolean.TRUE);
00378                         fkInfo.setInitiallyDeferred(Boolean.FALSE);
00379                     } else if (deferrablility == DatabaseMetaData.importedKeyNotDeferrable) {
00380                         fkInfo.setDeferrable(Boolean.FALSE);
00381                         fkInfo.setInitiallyDeferred(Boolean.FALSE);
00382                     }
00383                 }
00384 
00385                 //Add only if the key was created in this iteration (updating the instance values changes hashCode so it cannot be re-inserted into set) 
00386                 if (keySeq == 1) {
00387                     foreignKeys.add(fkInfo);
00388                 }
00389             }
00390 
00391             rs.close();
00392         }
00393     }
00394 
00395     protected void readIndexes(String schema) throws JDBCException, SQLException {
00396         updateListeners("Reading indexes for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00397 
00398         for (Table table : tablesMap.values()) {
00399             ResultSet rs;
00400             Statement statement = null;
00401             if (database instanceof OracleDatabase) {
00402                 //oracle getIndexInfo is buggy and slow.  See Issue 1824548 and http://forums.oracle.com/forums/thread.jspa?messageID=578383&#578383  
00403                 statement = database.getConnection().createStatement();
00404                 String sql = "SELECT INDEX_NAME, 3 AS TYPE, TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_POSITION AS ORDINAL_POSITION, null AS FILTER_CONDITION FROM ALL_IND_COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_OWNER='" + database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "' AND TABLE_NAME='" + table.getName() + "' ORDER BY INDEX_NAME, ORDINAL_POSITION";
00405                 rs = statement.executeQuery(sql);
00406             } else {
00407                 rs = databaseMetaData.getIndexInfo(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), table.getName(), false, true);
00408             }
00409             Map<String, Index> indexMap = new HashMap<String, Index>();
00410             while (rs.next()) {
00411                 String indexName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("INDEX_NAME"));
00412                 short type = rs.getShort("TYPE");
00413 //                String tableName = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME");
00414                 boolean nonUnique = true;
00415                 try {
00416                     nonUnique = rs.getBoolean("NON_UNIQUE");
00417                 } catch (SQLException e) {
00418                     //doesn't exist in all databases
00419                 }
00420                 String columnName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("COLUMN_NAME"));
00421                 short position = rs.getShort("ORDINAL_POSITION");
00422                 String filterCondition = rs.getString("FILTER_CONDITION");
00423 
00424                 if (type == DatabaseMetaData.tableIndexStatistic) {
00425                     continue;
00426                 }
00427 //                if (type == DatabaseMetaData.tableIndexOther) {
00428 //                    continue;
00429 //                }
00430 
00431                 if (columnName == null) {
00432                     //nothing to index, not sure why these come through sometimes
00433                     continue;
00434                 }
00435                 Index indexInformation;
00436                 if (indexMap.containsKey(indexName)) {
00437                     indexInformation = indexMap.get(indexName);
00438                 } else {
00439                     indexInformation = new Index();
00440                     indexInformation.setTable(table);
00441                     indexInformation.setName(indexName);
00442                     indexInformation.setUnique(!nonUnique);
00443                     indexInformation.setFilterCondition(filterCondition);
00444                     indexMap.put(indexName, indexInformation);
00445                 }
00446                 indexInformation.getColumns().add(position - 1, columnName);
00447             }
00448             for (Map.Entry<String, Index> entry : indexMap.entrySet()) {
00449                 indexes.add(entry.getValue());
00450             }
00451             rs.close();
00452             if (statement != null) {
00453                 statement.close();
00454             }
00455         }
00456 
00457         Set<Index> indexesToRemove = new HashSet<Index>();
00458         //remove PK indexes
00459         for (Index index : indexes) {
00460             for (PrimaryKey pk : primaryKeys) {
00461                 if (index.getTable().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(pk.getTable().getName())
00462                         && index.getColumnNames().equals(pk.getColumnNames())) {
00463                     indexesToRemove.add(index);
00464                 }
00465             }
00466             for (ForeignKey fk : foreignKeys) {
00467                 if (index.getTable().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(fk.getForeignKeyTable().getName())
00468                         && index.getColumnNames().equals(fk.getForeignKeyColumns())) {
00469                     indexesToRemove.add(index);
00470                 }
00471             }
00472         }
00473         indexes.removeAll(indexesToRemove);
00474     }
00475 
00476     protected void readPrimaryKeys(String schema) throws JDBCException, SQLException {
00477         updateListeners("Reading primary keys for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00478 
00479         //we can't add directly to the this.primaryKeys hashSet because adding columns to an exising PK changes the hashCode and .contains() fails
00480         List<PrimaryKey> foundPKs = new ArrayList<PrimaryKey>();
00481 
00482         for (Table table : tablesMap.values()) {
00483             ResultSet rs = databaseMetaData.getPrimaryKeys(database.convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(schema), database.convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema), table.getName());
00484 
00485             while (rs.next()) {
00486                 String tableName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("TABLE_NAME"));
00487                 String columnName = convertFromDatabaseName(rs.getString("COLUMN_NAME"));
00488                 short position = rs.getShort("KEY_SEQ");
00489 
00490                 boolean foundExistingPK = false;
00491                 for (PrimaryKey pk : foundPKs) {
00492                     if (pk.getTable().getName().equals(tableName)) {
00493                         pk.addColumnName(position - 1, columnName);
00494 
00495                         foundExistingPK = true;
00496                     }
00497                 }
00498 
00499                 if (!foundExistingPK) {
00500                     PrimaryKey primaryKey = new PrimaryKey();
00501                     primaryKey.setTable(table);
00502                     primaryKey.addColumnName(position - 1, columnName);
00503                     primaryKey.setName(convertPrimaryKeyName(rs.getString("PK_NAME")));
00504 
00505                     foundPKs.add(primaryKey);
00506                 }
00507             }
00508 
00509             rs.close();
00510         }
00511 
00512         this.primaryKeys.addAll(foundPKs);
00513     }
00514 
00515     protected String convertPrimaryKeyName(String pkName) throws SQLException {
00516         return pkName;
00517     }

00533     protected void readSequences(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00534         updateListeners("Reading sequences for " + database.toString() + " ...");
00535 
00536         if (database.supportsSequences()) {
00537             //noinspection unchecked
00538             List<String> sequenceNamess = (List<String>) database.getJdbcTemplate().queryForList(database.createFindSequencesSQL(schema), String.class);
00539 
00540 
00541             for (String sequenceName : sequenceNamess) {
00542                 Sequence seq = new Sequence();
00543                 seq.setName(sequenceName.trim());
00544 
00545                 sequences.add(seq);
00546             }
00547         }
00548     }
00549 
00550     protected void updateListeners(String message) {
00551         if (this.statusListeners == null) {
00552             return;
00553         }
00554         log.finest(message);
00555         for (DiffStatusListener listener : this.statusListeners) {
00556             listener.statusUpdate(message);
00557         }
00558     }
00559 
00560     public Table getTable(String tableName) {
00561         for (Table table : getTables()) {
00562             if (table.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(tableName)) {
00563                 return table;
00564             }
00565         }
00566         return null;
00567     }
00568 
00569     public ForeignKey getForeignKey(String foreignKeyName) {
00570         for (ForeignKey fk : getForeignKeys()) {
00571             if (fk.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(foreignKeyName)) {
00572                 return fk;
00573             }
00574         }
00575         return null;
00576     }
00577 
00578     public Sequence getSequence(String sequenceName) {
00579         for (Sequence sequence : getSequences()) {
00580             if (sequence.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(sequenceName)) {
00581                 return sequence;
00582             }
00583         }
00584         return null;
00585     }
00586 
00587     public Index getIndex(String indexName) {
00588         for (Index index : getIndexes()) {
00589             if (index.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(indexName)) {
00590                 return index;
00591             }
00592         }
00593         return null;
00594     }
00595 
00596     public View getView(String viewName) {
00597         for (View view : getViews()) {
00598             if (view.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(viewName)) {
00599                 return view;
00600             }
00601         }
00602         return null;
00603     }
00604 
00605     public PrimaryKey getPrimaryKey(String pkName) {
00606         for (PrimaryKey pk : getPrimaryKeys()) {
00607             if (pk.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(pkName)) {
00608                 return pk;
00609             }
00610         }
00611         return null;
00612     }
